string.name: what_s_new_latest
string.font:
New Features ✨ Added a feature allowing users to make the navigation bar use accent color. ✨ Toasts & SnackBars got a boost! Swipe to dismiss, expand for more info, and enjoy smoother interactions. ✨ New Playlists, Personalization, Settings, Albums and other screens. 

Bug Fixes: 
🐞 Minor Bug Fixes 
🐞 Fixed a bug causing albums to lose state once navigated away from them. 
🐞 Resolved an issue causing the screen to dim during video playback mode. 

In Focus 
 ⦿ General performance improvements 
 ⦿ Added support for in-app Video Browser and RecycleBin 
 ⦿ Enhanced with Noise Cancellation, Widgets, and more in-app Widgets 
Please keep supporting by sponsoring us or rating us in Playstore. 

Thanks Team Audio.
